description: All parking meters owned by the SFMTA and the Port of San Francisco as of March 2014. Find attached a data dictionary, a version of the map as a PDF, and a shapefile of the data. This data includes locations of meters; meter characteristics, such as single-space or multi-space meter, smart meter status, sensor status, owner, on or off-street location; rate areas; cap colors (use type and restrictions): Black: Motorcycle parking, Brown: Tour bus parking, Green: Short term parking, Grey: General metered parking, Purple: Boat trailer parking, Red: Six-wheeled commercial vehicle parking, Yellow: Commercial vehicle parking. Please direct any data inquiries to info@sfpark.org
